amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to codify the FEC definition of substantial assistance for an illegal foreign transaction and defines what it means to knowingly abet a foreign entity, consistent with FEC regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Houlahan.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
